info.title: Question & Topic Engine API
info.description: API Service for Topic, Content and Question Bank

post.description:
Create a new recursive topic.

Args:
    topic (TopicCreate): The topic data to create.

Returns:
    TopicResponse: The created topic.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If an error occurs while creating the topic.

get.description:
Get all topics.

Args:
    offset (int, optional): The offset for pagination. Defaults to 0.
    limit (int, optional): The limit for pagination. Defaults to 100.

Returns:
    PaginatedTopicRead: The list of topics paginated.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If an error occurs while retrieving topics.

get.summary: Get Topic And Its Content By Id
get.description:
Get a Topic and its Content by ID.

Args:
    topic_id (int): The ID of the topic.

Returns:
    TopicResponse: The topic with the specified ID.

patch.description:
Update a topic by ID.

Args:
    topic_id (int): The ID of the topic to update.
    topic (TopicUpdate): The updated topic data.

Returns:
    TopicResponse: The updated topic.

delete.description:
Delete a topic by ID.

Args:
    topic_id (int): The ID of the topic to delete.

post.description:
Add a question to the database.

Args:
    question (QuestionBank): The question to be added.
    db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    QuestionBank: The added question.

get.description:
Get all questions from the database.

Args:
    offset (int, optional): The offset for pagination. Defaults to 0.
    limit (int, optional): The limit for pagination. Defaults to 100.
   db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    list[QuestionBank]: The list of questions.

schema.title: Response Call Read Questions Api V1 Question Get

get.description:
Get all questions of a specific topic from the database.

Args:
    topic_id (int): The topic ID.
   db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    list[QuestionBank]: The list of questions.

schema.title: Response Call Read Questions By Topic Api V1 Question Read Topic  Topic Id  Get

get.description:
Get a question by its ID from the database.

Args:
    question_id (int): The ID of the question.
   db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    QuestionBank: The retrieved question.

patch.description:
Update a question by its ID in the database.

Args:
    question_id (int): The ID of the question.
    question (QuestionBank): The updated question.
    db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    QuestionBank: The updated question.

delete.description:
Delete a question by its ID from the database.

Args:
    question_id (int): The ID of the question.
   db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    deletion status.

get.summary: Call Get Mcq Options By Question Id
get.description:
Get all MCQ options by question_id from the database.

Args:
    question_id (int): The ID of the question.
    db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    list[MCQOption]: The list of MCQ options.

schema.title: Response Call Get Mcq Options By Question Id Api V1 Answer Mcq Option Question  Question Id  Get

post.description:
Add an MCQ option to the database.

Args:
    mcq_option (MCQOption): The MCQ option to be added.
   db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    MCQOption: The added MCQ option.

get.summary: Call Get Mcq Option By Id
get.description:
Get an MCQ option by its ID from the database.

Args:
    mcq_option_id (int): The ID of the MCQ option.
   db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    MCQOption: The retrieved MCQ option.

patch.description:
Update an MCQ option by its ID in the database.

Args:
    mcq_option_id (int): The ID of the MCQ option.
    mcq_option (MCQOption): The updated MCQ option.
   db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    MCQOption: The updated MCQ option.

delete.description:
Delete an MCQ option by its ID from the database.

Args:
    mcq_option_id (int): The ID of the MCQ option.
   db (optional) : Database Dependency Injection.

Returns:
    deletion status.

post.description:
Create a new Quiz

Args:
    quiz (QuizCreate): Quiz to be created

Returns:
    QuizReadWithQuizTopics: The created Quiz and QuizTopics Included

Raises:
    HTTPException: Error in creating Quiz

get.description:
Read all Quizzes

Args:
    offset (int, optional): Offset for pagination. Defaults to 0.
    limit (int, optional): Limit for pagination. Defaults to 10.

Returns:
    list[QuizReadWithTopics]: List of Quizzes with QuizTopics Included

Raises:
    HTTPException: Error in fetching Quizzes

schema.title: Response Call Read All Quizzes Api V1 Quiz All  Course Id  Get

get.description:
Read a Quiz by ID

Args:
    quiz_id (int): ID of the Quiz

Returns:
    QuizReadWithQuizTopics: The Quiz with QuizTopics Included

Raises:
    HTTPException: Quiz not found

patch.description:
Partially Update an existing Quiz

Args:
    quiz_id (int): ID of the Quiz
    quiz (QuizUpdate): Updated Quiz Data

Returns:
    QuizReadWithQuizTopics: The updated Quiz with QuizTopics Included

Raises:
    HTTPException: Quiz not found

delete.description:
Delete an existing Quiz

Args:
    quiz_id (int): ID of the Quiz

Returns:
    dict: Success Message

Raises:
    HTTPException: Quiz not found

post.description:
Create a new Quiz Question

Args:
    quiz_id (int): ID of the Quiz
    quiz_question_data (QuestionBankCreate): Quiz Question Data to add in QuestionBank and Link to QuizQuestion

Returns:
    QuizQuestion: The created Quiz Question

Raises:
    HTTPException: Error in creating Quiz Question

delete.description:
Remove an existing Quiz Question

Args:
    quiz_question_id (int): ID of the Quiz Question

Returns:
    dict: Success Message

Raises:
    HTTPException: Quiz Question not found

schema.title: Response Get All Quiz Settings Endpoint Api V1 Quiz Setting Get
